channel.title: London City on Sky Travel Blogger
channel.description: Recent content in London City on Sky Travel Blogger

item.title: 24 Things to See in London
item.description: London the city of dreams. It’s the place where everything happens. So many movies are filmed there, books are based there and it’s a place that people love to travel to and its usually a stop over destination to so many countries. We recently traveled to London with a group of family and friends. Check out my list of must-see places to visit in London and pictures from our travels

item.title: 5 Day - London Itinerary
item.description: We stayed in the Westminster District so this itinerary is routed from there, but feel free to adjust from wherever you are staying from We highly recommend you buy these tickets beforehand for these Attractions if you plan to visit : Buckingham Palace Tour Kensington Palace Tour Westminster Abbey London Eye Tower of London Madam Tussaud’s St Paul’s Cathedral Book your afternoon Tea experience And which Day tour you decide to do via Viator Transportation : The easiest mode of Transportation within London is by Underground and/or Bus.
